Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #30 buses will operate in both directions via 92nd, Commercial, and 91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via 92nd, Commercial, and 91st.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 92nd at Houston.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Midway. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Midway.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound BlueLine Delays
ShortDescription: Some O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier door problem on a train near Forest Park. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier door problem on a train near Forest Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
